title: T206 Needs ++ Shot in the dark +++
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: T206 Needs ++ Shot in the dark +++
posts.post_content:
Total shot in the dark on these, but if you don’t ask, you don’t know...... ;)

Here is small, but tough, list of “back upgrades” that would really help my set (player – possible backs):

[STRIKE]Chance (Portrait Yellow) -- AB, Cycle, EPDG[/STRIKE]
Chase (Holding Trophy) -- AB, Cycle
[STRIKE]Griffith, bat -- Cycle[/STRIKE]
Mullin, bat -- Cycle, EPDG
Pelty (Vertical) -- AB, Cycle, EPDG

As stated a “few” times …. :p …. I collect raw, but graded cards 3 or less are acceptable.

Any help ??

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott
Sending a PM, I have a Chance EPDG SGC 1.5

Big THANKS to Bob I. for making Chance available..............:)

Good ol' BST come through again, big time.  The total transaction took less than a half hour after the original post !!!!!


I also have to thank my good friend Luke for reminding me that I had got this card from him:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=648513&d=1737651096[/IMG]

I'm not to worried about my memory, heck it was almost two months ago ...... :p


"Two" down in one day ...... not bad ...........;)

Fun, fun, Scott :rolleyes:
